FuncDef:
The ppp mp mp-group command adds an interface to an MP-group interface.
The undo ppp mp command deletes an interface from an MP-group interface.
By default, no interface is added to an MP-group interface.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To increase bandwidth, enhance reliability, and perform load-balancing, run the ppp mp mp-group command to add physical interfaces to an MP-group interface.
Precautions
When adding interfaces to an MP-group interface, note the following:
These interfaces must be added to the same MP-group interface in the same mode.The MP-group interfaces on both ends of an MP link must have the same number of member interfaces.After multiple interfaces are added to a local MP-group interface, the peer interfaces directly connected to these interfaces must be added to the peer MP-group interface.
To ensure that PPP renegotiates and all the interfaces are successfully added to an MP-group, restart all the interfaces after the configuration.
